name: FNF Zardy Test
description:
It's Ruv from Week "Foolhardy" Friday Night Funkin Mid Fight Masses! Play as Zardy Foolhardy! Credits do really go to SwankyBox and KadeDev for making the Friday Night Funkin' Vs. Zardy - Foolhardy mod! Play on the web here on a PC/Mobile devices! If you want, if you have a windows computer, you can also download it with the download button below!

Controls: 

To switch to touch control, touch the toggle in game.

Arrow keys to play the sounds (For mobile press D-pad button)

Hold space and press any other arrow key for secondary sound

Secret Key = ??? ;)

Hold any of the buttons to hold a pose!

Check out the Friday Night Funkin' here: https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

Also check out Friday Night Funkin' on Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/770371

Check out the original Friday Night Funkin' Vs. Zardy - Foolhardy mod: https://gamebanana.com/mods/44366
